collectionId.description: The UUID of the collection associated with the document operation.

name.description: The name of the document. Must not be empty.

type.description: Optional MIME type of the document (e.g., "application/pdf").

file.description: The path to the file to upload. Must be a non-empty string representing a valid file path.

instructions.description: Optional additional instructions for processing the document. If provided, must not be empty.

job.description: Whether to dispatch a processing job. Defaults to true. Set to false to skip.

tables.description: Flag to perform additional table processing and analysis on the document.
